name: Cube Game #8008
description:
In this game, you play as red square. If touch grey square, die.

In all seriousness, this is my first attempt at creating a game, and I'm more or less just creating this page to make it easier to share with friends. I followed Brackeys' tutorial on how to make a game in unity, but I added 7 more levels, and decided to make them noticeably harder than Brackeys' three.  Enjoy!

Ps. Level 10 was not play-tested for my own sanity. Have fun with that one.
